On May 11, 2004, the website of the militant [[Islamist]] group '''Muntada al-Ansar''' broadcast a video titled "[[Abu Musab al-Zarqawi]] shown slaughtering an [[United States|American]]", which shows the American citizen [[Nick Berg]] being decapitated.
On May 11, 2004, the website of the militant [[Islamist]] group '''Muntada al-Ansar''' broadcast a video titled "[[Abu Musab al-Zarqawi]] shown slaughtering an [[United States|American]]", which shows the American citizen [[Nick Berg]] being decapitated.
